testcase.name: 99.32-TestCase-dimensions-dependent
testcase.description: Rule of thumb: This report model and report is XBRL valid but the representation approach is inconsistent with best practices for representing multiple dimensions. The representation includes dimensions that are dependent.

variation.name: dimensions-dependent
variation.description: Rule of thumb: This report model and report is XBRL valid but the representation approach is inconsistent with best practices for representing multiple dimensions. The representation includes dimensions that are dependent.
